standup.title: One thing only
standup.summary: Each team member only talks about the single most important thing they want to tell people
standup.description: Take turns giving updates. Each team member only talks about the single most important thing they want to tell people.
benefits: Helps keep meetings short and focused
Helps encourage team members to use other communication channels to talk about things that arenâ€™t crucial for standup - i.e. it encourages people to actually talk to each other outside of standup.
